boat.full_description:
Since 2006, John Krejsa of Woodbridge, Suffolk has been restoring 'Mist' to her former glory. She was relaunched on 17 September, 2016.

With copies of her original drawings, John restored her as near as possible to her designer, Albert Strange's intentions. It is a remarkable transformation, seeing her change from the boat found 70' deep on the bottom of Gairloch to the beautiful canoe stern yawl swinging across into the water on launch day.
boat.name: Mist
boat.short_description: 'Mist' was designed by Albert Strange in 1906 and built in 1907 for cruising the western isles of Scotland.
